q: Which of the following actions can be executed in transaction Edit Profile Parameters (RZ11)? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
choices: Download values of all profile parameters in one step.
Display the value of individual profile parameters.
Set new values for profile parameters in profile files.
Change values of dynamic profile parameters.

q: Which entity contains authorizations for users in an AS ABAP-based SAP system?
Which of the following is a command-line tool to start or stop SAP systems and SAP instances?
When importing a transport request, which steps are executed by a batch job? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
You are using a Change and Transport System (CTS) for the transport of native SAP HANA applications. Which tool can you use to create a transport request for these applications in the CTS system?
When performing a local client copy with transaction SCCLN, in which client is it recommended to start the client copy?
choices: A client different from both the source and the target client

q: How are savepoints triggered? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
What can you do to determine the SAPUI5 patch level in an AS ABAP-based SAP system?
choices: Check the version of software component SAP_UI

q: What actions can you perform using the SAP_FIORI_FOUNDATION_S4 task list? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
choices: Schedule a job for calculation of SAPUI5 application index.
Create users with generated business roles.

q: You plan to update an AS ABAP-based SAP system with the role “Quality Assurance System”. Which of the following actions might be required before you start Software Update Manager (SUM) for this system? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
choices: Import the modification adjustment transports from the update of the “Development System”.
Follow the instructions in the SAP Notes for the used version of SUM.
Execute the SAP Load Generator (SGEN) transaction for invalid loads.

q: You are preparing an installation of an AS ABAP-based SAP system. You already downloaded all software that Maintenance Planner can calculate. What else must you download?

When installing an SAP S/4HANA Server 1909 system, which actions can the Software Provisioning Manager (SWPM) perform only when the installation is started with the option SAPINST_STACK_XML? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
choices: Set the password of user DDIC in client 000

q: You have passed the initial authentication for an SAP Fiori transactional app. Which authentication technology is used for subsequent OData calls of this app?
When releasing a workbench request from the development system, what are prerequisites for an export to take place? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
choices: Repository objects within the workbench request must be assigned to a package.
A delivery route from the development system to a subsequent system must exist.
Repository objects within the workbench request must be assigned to the same transport layer.
Packages used by objects in the workbench request must be assigned to a valid transport layer.
A consolidation route from the development system to a subsequent system must exist.

q: What is the correct sequence of the following four steps when you restart the SAP HANA database system?
choices: Row tables are loaded into memory. Column tables are loaded. Open transactions are recovered. Aborted transactions are rolled back.
Aborted transactions are rolled back. Open transactions are recovered. Row tables are loaded into memory. Column tables are loaded.
Row tables are loaded into memory. Open transactions are recovered. Aborted transactions are rolled back. Column tables are loaded.
Aborted transactions are rolled back. Row tables are loaded into memory. Open transactions are recovered. Column tables are loaded.

q: Which app types need SAP HANA as system database? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
In an SAP S/4HANA Server system, a target system alias FIORI is maintained for source system alias S4FIN. Which connection is relevant for the extraction of back-end catalogs with alias S4FIN?
Which file systems are supported for the data and log volumes of the SAP HANA 2.0 database system? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
From top to bottom, what is the hierarchy of the NetWeaver Administrator (NWA)?
Which of the following background jobs has the highest priority?
choices: Class A job without a target server
Class C job with a target server
Class C job without a target server
Class A job with a target server

q: Under which Java System Properties category do you find an AS Java-based Manager in the SAP NetWeaver Administrator (NWA)?
Which actions can be performed with the Software Update Manager (SUM) for an AS ABAP-based SAP system? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
choices: Correcting software information via a CISI run
Setting up the Transport Management System (TMS)

q: What are prerequisites for enabling communication between a standalone SAP Web Dispatcher and an AS ABAP-based SAP system? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
choices: Identification of the HTTP port of the ABAP message server
Identification of the HTTP port of the PAS instance’s ICM process

q: What are prerequisites to use the Software Update Manager to apply SAP Support Packages to an AS ABAP-based SAP system? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
choices: A Stack XML file must exist.
The SUM archive must have been provided to the SAP Host Agent.
The SAP Host Agent must have been configured by SUM.
The SUM archive must have been extracted.
The latest SAP kernel patch has been applied to the SAP system.

q: What can you configure by maintaining table HTTPURLLOC?
choices: The hostname of the URL launched by transaction /UI2/FLP
The URL of a local web server for user assistance resources
The URL used by classic applications
The path of the URL launched by transaction /UI2/FLP

q: In an AS ABAP-based SAP system, you need to create a user that is not enabled for dialog interaction and is subject to the validity period of passwords. Which user type do you choose?

Using standard transport protocol settings, after importing a transport request, which log file provides the return codes of the individual import steps? Note: These answers use the following abbreviations: year, week, quarter, SAP system ID, and a 5-digit number.
You are importing an SAP Support Package Stack with transaction SPAM. Which steps require SAP system downtime? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
choices: Import of inactive dictionary objects (DD IMPORT)

q: You are logged onto an AS ABAP-based SAP system. What happens when you release a task of a transport request that contains changes to a program?
choices: A data file and a cofile are created.
The object list is handed over to the transport request.
A version is created in version management.

q: What is the definition of a Transport Group in the Transport Management System (TMS)?
choices: A collection of systems that are assigned to the same transport target group
A collection of systems that share the same transport directory
A collection of systems that are connected by transport routes
A collection of systems that are controlled by the same transport domain controller

q: In an embedded deployment, which protocol is used by object pages to access the SAP S/4HANA system?
Which services can you stop in the SAP HANA cockpit from the SYSTEMDB Manage Services app? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
During startup, an AS Java-based SAP system generates an error. Which file contains information about manager and services?
What are some start conditions of a background job in an AS ABAP-based SAP system? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
choices: Reaching a specific date and time

q: Using standard tp settings, how does the transport strategy “Queue-Driven Transports, Mass Transports” differ from “Queue-Driven Transports, Single Transports”? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
choices: Using the “Import Request” button causes the imported transport requests to remain in the import queue.
The “Import All Requests” button is available.
Return Code 16 is caused by an erroneous object in a transport request.
Return Code 8 is considered a successful import.
The import process can be scheduled in the background.

q: When performing a standard SAP HANA database system installation, which users will be created or validated during that installation? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
You want to add an SAP Fiori group to a user’s SAP Fiori launchpad. To what do you have to assign the SAP Fiori group?
choices: To a user group assigned to the user
To a parameter ID of the user
To a role assigned to the user
To an authorization profile assigned to the user

q: When performing a local client copy, which client copy profiles are available? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
choices: All Client-Specific Data without Change Documents
Application Data and User Master Data
Customizing, User Master Record, and User Variants
User Master Records and Authorization Profiles

q: Which processes can run optionally as part of ABAP SAP Central Services (ASCS)? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
In the role maintenance transaction (PFCG) of an AS ABAP-based SAP system, which step grants the authorizations of a role to a user master record?
choices: Assign a user to the role

q: What is the purpose of the SAP HANA secure user store (hdbuserstore)? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
choices: To store connection information on the SAP HANA XS advanced engine
To configure an SAP HANA auto-restart for fault recovery
To store connection information on the SAP HANA database client
To configure fail-over support in a 3-tier scenario

q: You configure the Transport Management System (TMS) as part of the installation of an AS ABAP-based SAP system. What information can you supply for the first SAP system that uses a specific transport directory? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
choices: The description of the AS ABAP-based SAP system
The name of the Transport Domain
The password of a new user that will be created
The name of the Transport Group
The user ID of a new user that will be created

q: You are running an SAP HANA database in log mode "normal". Under what circumstances does the database automatically execute a regular log backup? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
choices: When the time threshold is exceeded
When the log segment is full
When the log buffer is full

q: What is the correct parameter-replacement sequence in an AS Java-based SAP system?
choices: Template custom → Instance custom → Template default → Instance default
Instance default → Instance custom → Template default → Template custom
Instance custom → Instance default → Template custom → Template default
Template default → Instance default → Template custom → Instance custom

q: When you install SAP Solution Manager 7.2 AS Java, what information do you need to provide? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
choices: The decision whether to install an SAP Gateway integrated in the SCS instance
The package path to an archive for SAP JVM
The package path to additional language installation media
The decision to use an External ABAP System as UME Data Source

q: You want to configure the transport domain for the transport of AS Java-based SAP systems (for example SAP Enterprise Portal). Which entry type do you create for these systems in the System Overview area of the Transport Management System (transaction STMS)?

Your SAP S/4HANA Server system consists of an ABAP Central Services instance, a Primary Application Server instance, and two Additional Application Server instances. How many system profile files are evaluated for this SAP system during system start?
In which subdirectories of /sapmnt can you find information about startup problems of an AS Java-based SAP system? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
How does SAP HANA encrypt the data persistence layer?
In an AS ABAP-based SAP system, where is the lock table stored?
choices: Main memory of the Primary Application Server instance
File system of the Primary Application Server instance
Main memory of the Central Services instance

q: In ABAP programs, what are features of ABAP SQL that are not available with native SQL? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
choices: Execution of ABAP programs as database procedures
Use of the AS ABAP data buffer

q: How can the system database administrator disable tenant database functionalities? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
choices: Using the Manage Restricted Features app
Using the Manage Database Configuration app

q: When using the Java Startup and Control Framework to shut down an AS Java-based SAP system, which component actually stops the server process(es)?
Which file-system locations do you need to specify when installing the SAP HANA multi-host database system using the default settings? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
You want to configure the TMS QA Approval procedure for an AS ABAP-based system landscape. Which approval steps can you choose? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
choices: To be approved by request owner
To be approved by system administration
To be approved by project manager

q: For an SAP HANA Tailored Datacenter Integration (TDI) approach, what is the additional disk-space factor required during delta-merge operations?
You are configuring outbound e-mails for an AS ABAP-based SAP system. What can you use to set the default domain?
In which situations can you resume the failed recovery of your productive SAP HANA tenant database? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
choices: An aborted recovery of the configuration files
An aborted recovery of a complete data backup
An aborted recovery of a delta data backup
An aborted recovery of a log backup

q: Which characteristics describe an SAP HANA Multitenant Database Container (MDC) system? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
choices: The name server provides index-server functionality for the system database.
Database isolation increases tenant separation at the operating-system level.
Each tenant database runs its own compile and preprocessor servers.
The name server owns information about the location of tables and partitions.
An MDC system is identified by a single System ID (SID).

q: Which tasks can you perform when using the SAP HANA Database Lifecycle Manager (HDBLCM) from the SAP HANA installation media? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
choices: Rename the SAP HANA database system
Extract the SAP HANA database system components
Uninstall the SAP HANA database system and its components
Update the SAP HANA database system and its components

q: Which of the following protocols is SAP’s RFC protocol based on? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
You are using a standard three-system landscape (DEV, QAS and PRD). When will a change of a repository object in the QAS system be treated as a correction?
choices: If the object was created in DEV and transported to QAS via a transport of copies.
If the object’s name is in the SAP namespace.
If the object was created in DEV and transported to QAS via a workbench request.
If the original system of the object is QAS.

q: You are installing an SAP S/4HANA Server 1909 system, using s4xhost as the application-server host and haxhost as the database host. Which actions can Software Provisioning Manager (SWPM) perform? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
choices: Set database import parameters for the database running on haxhost
Copy the database installation media from s4xhost to haxhost
Install the Central Services instance on s4xhost
Copy the database backup media from s4xhost to haxhost

q: Which parameters are mandatory when using the HDBLCM tool to install the SAP HANA database system in batch mode? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
The SAP Fiori launchpad is working for your users. How can you enable access to the SAP Easy Access menu for them in the App Finder? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
choices: By providing an HTTP destination type H named FIORI_CLASSICUI_HTTPS (transaction SM59)
By applying the correct settings in the SAP Fiori launchpad configuration (transaction /UI2/FLP_SYS_CONF or /UI2/FLP_CUS_CONF)
By assigning the correct target mappings shipped via catalog /UI2/CLASSICAL_GUI_MENU
By assigning the authorization to start transaction SEARCH_SAP_MENU

q: You are updating an AS Java-based SAP system. Which actions can Software Update Manager execute? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
choices: Update without using a stack configuration file (stack XML file)

q: Which of the following tools are used when importing a transport request? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
You want to set up a printer locally on a Microsoft Windows-based AS ABAP. Which host spool access method must you use?
You have configured an SAP Web Dispatcher and set: wdisp/ssl_encrypt=2 icm/server_port_<xx>=PROT=HTTP Which communication channels does this establish?
choices: HTTP between the client and SAP Web Dispatcher; HTTPS between SAP Web Dispatcher and the SAP system
HTTPS between the client and SAP Web Dispatcher; HTTP between SAP Web Dispatcher and the SAP system
HTTP between the client and SAP Web Dispatcher; HTTP between SAP Web Dispatcher and the SAP system
HTTPS between the client and SAP Web Dispatcher; HTTPS between SAP Web Dispatcher and the SAP system

q: Which tools can be used to create SAP Fiori catalogs? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
You are working in an AS ABAP-based SAP system that runs on Linux. Where is the spool data stored when you use the value IGI for the profile parameter rspo/store_location?

For AS ABAP-based SAP systems, you can use Software Update Manager to update which of the following? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
During the import of a transport request, which tools write log files to the tmp subdirectory of the transport directory? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
You are running an AS ABAP-based SAP system. Which parts does the Internet Server Cache (ISC) of the ICM process consist of? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.
How can you register multiple SAP Gateway services simultaneously? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
You are installing a Primary Application Server and a Central Services instance for an AS Java-based SAP system. What is the minimum number of Java server nodes you must configure?
Which work-process types can create spool requests? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
Which instances have processes that establish a connection to the database of an SAP system? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
Which changes in an AS Java-based SAP system require a restart of the affected server process(es) before they take effect? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
choices: A change of a manager property value
A change of the key phrase
A change of the UME data source
A change of a service property value

q: What are start conditions of a background job in an AS ABAP-based SAP system? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
choices: Starting of a dynamic work process
Reaching a specific date and time

q: You have created a task list (STC01) in your development system. What can you use to make the task list available in the quality-assurance system?
In an AS ABAP-based SAP system, what can you use to change the value of a dynamically switchable parameter at runtime?
You have restarted the Primary Application Server instance. After the restart, changes will take effect for which profiles? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.
